articles.author: Joseph Ataman, Larry Madowo, Caitlin Hu, Shirin Faqiri, Sana Noor Haq
articles.title: Europeans evacuated from Niger as neighboring West African juntas warn against intervention - CNN
articles.description: Hundreds of French and European evacuees gathered at the airport in Niger’s capital of Niamey on Tuesday after a presidential coup plunged the West African nation into a political crisis that polarized neighboring countries in the region.
